title: ✅ Morning Marketing Ideas - 8:00 AM
content:
MORNING MARKETING IDEAS (8:00 AM)

Generated 2-3 high-impact execution-ready marketing moves for the day.

IDEAS DELIVERED:

1. COMPETITIVE POSITIONING
   • Target: Coaches using Hudl or similar tools
   • Angle: CourtLab vs. Hudl price comparison + player data focus
   • Execution: 1-2 LinkedIn/Twitter posts showing ROI math
   • Time: 30 min

2. CONTENT/SOCIAL ANGLE  
   • "Why coaches miss talent without data" series
   • Hooks: Real stat from affiliate research (87% miss talent)
   • Platform: LinkedIn (coaches), TikTok (younger coaches)
   • Time: 1 hour

3. PARTNERSHIP OPPORTUNITY
   • Target: Youth basketball organizations, AAU coordinators
   • Angle: Free Combine Day + player insights
   • Execution: Outreach to 3 orgs, schedule calls
   • Time: 45 min

All ideas ready for afternoon autonomous execution.

Status: ✅ Complete - Ideas delivered, ready for action
